title: How to Make a Green Screen
category_hierarchy: Digital Technology Art and Craft Projects

steps.headline: Get green non-reflective fabric (felt, fleece) from the Internet or a craft store, or paint fabric green.
steps.description: See "Tips" below for help with the paint formula.

steps.headline: Cut the fabric to desired size.
Make a frame out of PVC that is slightly bigger, i.e.
steps.description: if fabric is 4'x 6' make frame 5' x 7'.

steps.headline: Cut holes in the fabric near its edges every foot.
Drill holes on the inside of the PVC frame every foot following pattern used on the fabric.
Loop bungee cords or strong rubber bands through holes in both the frame and fabric so that it is taut.
Shoot in well and evenly lit room.

tyn: 4 or more bungee cords or strong rubber bands
